Author: piipiistorm
Text: I did, and guess what? She already knew how shitty itd be if she did that and locked herself in her car before calling. But how she phrased her introduction made it seem like she was in the car with her friends.  I made it a bigger situation than it actually was and feel like a dumbass. I blew up and cried my little eyes out over a misunderstanding.   Her being her, she was ready to hold me and make sure I was okay 😌❤✌🌟

Author: fuwap
Text: if you haven’t talked to her about this you should! it can be so hard to confront someone especially about shit like this, but it doesn’t even have to be a big thing, maybe just something like “hey can you please not talk about that in front of others?” I’m sure she will totally understand, and probably be thankful that you decided to tell her what she’s doing to upset you so she can change it :) good luck
